node.title: Training
node.excerpt: Our team understands your business. That’s why we offer you a selection of role-specific training to help you make the most of offering payment options to your customers. node.title: Loan Types
node.excerpt: Research shows that 50% of home improvement projects above $5,000 are financed in some way. If you aren’t offering your customers payment options, you could be leaving half of the business on the table — to be picked up by your competitors. Offering payment options gives your customers greater spending power to get the project […]
